text: @narendramodi @AnkitBagdi8 The new Definition Of #DomicileLaw was intentionally issued at the depth of night while the world is under the grip of a deadly #pandemic. India uses #Coronavirus fear & #Lockdown to speed-up demographic plans in disputed #Kashmir.
